item.title: Essilor introduces the latest Varilux progressive lenses designed to provide immediate focusing and clearer vision
item.description:
· As Singapore’s population ages, with a projected median age of 47 by 2030, presbyopia, also known as long-sightedness, is expected to become a more prevalent health concern. Globally, over 500 million people are affected by presbyopia, and this number is predicted to reach 714 million for those aged 65 and above by 2020. · Varilux, a leading brand of progressive lenses, introduces a new patented technology designed to enhance vision...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/essilor-introduces-the-latest-varilux-progressive-lenses-designed-to-provide-immediate-focusing-and-clearer-vision/
